data.title: Jenny McCarthy Relationships Over The Years – Who Has She Dated?
data.meta_description: Jenny McCarthy is an American actress, model, comedian and television personality. Jenny has worked her way up from simple modeling gigs to her own talk
data.text:
Jenny McCarthy is an American actress, model, comedian and television personality. Jenny has worked her way up from simple modeling gigs to her own talk show. Jenny has had an adventurous career. Before we dive into Jenny McCarthy’s relationships, let’s take a look at who she is.

Jenny McCarthy was born in Evergreen Park, Illinois on November 1, 1972. She was born into a hardworking Catholic family and was the second of four daughters born to Linda and Dan McCarthy. His mother was the court keeper and his father the steel foreman. Her siblings are named Lynette, Joanne and Amy. Jenny attended Moher McAuley Liberal Arts High School during her school days, which wasn’t necessarily the easiest as she revealed she was bullied. She also spent a few years at Southern Illinois University.

When she graduated in 1993, Jenny had the opportunity to pose for Playboy magazine in the October issue of that year. He was offered $20,000 for the shoot. She accepted the offer and was later named Playmate of the Month for October 1993. The pose had a theme centered around her Catholic upbringing and a schoolgirl side. Jenny received an additional $100,000 at the end of the year when she was named Playmate of the Year.

McCarthy reveals the pose was not well received by her Catholic friends. His immediate family did not appreciate his appearance on a platform celebrating values ​​foreign to his upbringing.

McCarthy was able to build on his newfound fame to help launch other adventures in his life, moving to Los Angeles to host a Playboy TV show. From there she worked with MTV on the dating show Singled Out. She has made appearances on the World Wrestling Federation (WWF) platform. Jenny began hosting her own self-titled show, The Jenny McCarthy Show in 1997. She worked with NBC on the second season of Love in the Wild in 2012 and later returned to television with her own show again ..

Also read: Who is Ryan Seacrest, Dating now, What is his relationship with Kelly Ripa?

Another gig came in 2013, hosting The View, a daytime talk show. McCarthy has made guest appearances in various movies including Scary Movie 3 as well as the TV series, Two and a Half Men. His abilities as an author are tested with various publications under his name. Some of her works include: Louder Than Words: A Mother’s Path to Curing Autism.

Jenny McCarthy Relationships Over the Years

For anyone who has laid eyes on Jenny McCarthy, you would come to one major conclusion; she is a beauty. It’s no wonder, then, that over the years she’s dated a small number of men. She recently revealed that she once had an abusive and manipulative relationship, although she didn’t mention it. We take a look at her dating history and find out the men she’s dated.

Ray Manzella

For McCarthy, her first known romantic relationship was with her manager, Ray Manzella. The pair is dated from 1994 to 1998.

John Mallory Asher

Probably his most important relationship because of what came out of it in the end. Jenny had met John on the set of a movie. They started dating in late 1998 and were engaged the following year. The two men had been married for six years before separating in mid-2005. They have one son together, Evan Joseph Asher, born May 18, 2002.

jim carrey

McCarthy began dating Jim Carrey in December 2005. Jenny publicly declared they weren’t getting married saying they didn’t need a piece of paper. The couple, however, separated in 2010.

Jason Toohey

Her relationship with Jason was short-lived. Jenny started dating the fitness model in August 2010, but it was over four months later.

Paul Krepelka

McCarthy reportedly dated sports attorney Paul Krepelka. They are said to have kissed on live TV, but it all went wrong soon after.

Donnie Wahlberg

In July 2013, the relationship between Donnie Wahlberg and Jenny McCarthy were made public by McCarthy. In 2014, during a show, Jenny announced that she was engaged to Donnie and the couple married on August 31, 2014.
